src:
Persebaya Akan Mewaspadai Key Player Tira Persikabo
07 Nov 2019, 01:57 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Pelatih Persebaya Surabaya, Aji Santoso akan menginstruksikan kepada anak asuhnya untuk mewaspadai sejumlah key player PS Tira Persikabo. Kedua tim akan bersua pada pekan ke-27 Shopee Liga 1 2019.
Hanya saja, arsitek asal Kepanjen, Kabupaten Malang tersebut tidak membeberkan siapa saja pemain kunci lawan yang akan mendapat perhatian lebih.
"Tentunya ada beberapa pemain yang memang menjadi catatan kami agar pemain lebih waspada," kata Aji Santoso kepada awak media.
"Tapi tetap kami tidak menggunakan man to man marking, tapi kira-kira siapa yang menjadi key player dari mereka itu yang sedikit kami lebih waspada," tegas Aji.
Sementara, beberapa pemain Tira Persikabo yang bisa menjadi ancaman adalah Ciro Henrique, Osas Saha, dan Wawan Febrianto. Sejauh ini, mereka merupakan penyumbang gol terbanyak.
Ada pula mantan anak buah Aji Santoso, Loris Arnaud yang juga punya kontribusi cukup besar bagi Laskar Padjajaran. Tetapi, bomber asal Prancis tersebut masih dibekap cedera.

Scroll ke bawah untuk informasi selengkapnya ya Bolaneters
text:
Persebaya Will Watch Out for Tira Persikabo's Key Player
Nov 7 2019, 01:57 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Persebaya Surabaya coach, Aji Santoso will instruct his foster children to be aware of a number of PS Tira Persikabo's key players. The two teams will meet in the 27th week of Shopee Liga 1 2019.
However, the architect from Kepanjen, Malang Regency did not reveal who the other key players would get more attention.
"Obviously there are some players that have become our record so that players are more vigilant," Aji Santoso told media crews.
"But still we do not use man to man marking, but about who becomes the key player of them, we are a bit more cautious," said Aji.
Meanwhile, some Tira Persikabo players who could be a threat are Ciro Henrique, Osas Saha, and Wawan Febrianto. So far, they are the biggest goal contributor.
There was also Aji Santoso's former subordinate, Loris Arnaud who also had a significant contribution to the Laskar Padjajaran. However, the French bomber was still injured.
